20-0849.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes for the State Legislation Committee meeting held Wednesday, June 24, 2020.A motion was made by Vice Chair Uranga, seconded by Chair Richardson, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 2 - Uranga and RichardsonPage 1 of 4TELECONFERENCE, 3:30 PMTHURSDAY, SEPTEMBER 3, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHSTATE LEGISLATION COMMITTEE MINUTESAbsent: 1 - Austin2.

20-0850.summary: Recommendation to receive and file a report on Proposition 15 (“Tax on Commercial and Industrial Properties for Education and Local Government Funding Initiative”), take a potential position, and forward the State Legislation Committee’s recommendation to the City Council for adoption. Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Chair Richardson spoke.Vice Chair Uranga spoke.A motion was made by Chair Richardson, seconded by Vice Chair Uranga, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 2 - Uranga and RichardsonAbsent: 1 - Austin3.
